document_data.name: Great Horseshoe Chamber
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great Horsehoe Chamber''' was the dominant feature of the [[Horseshoe Temple Oasis]] in the [[Quoya Desert]] of the [[Hordelands]] during the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The chamber was located on the left side of the great chamber level of the temple. It measured {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} wide by {{SI|45|ft|long=yes}} long. A large statue of [[Hung Te Ping]] dominated the center of the chamber. A rock sat before the statue and was believed to have been struck by Hung's [[horse]]. A distinct aura of well-being could be felt within the Great Horseshoe Chamber.
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[oni]] who occupied the temple in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, avoided this chamber.
